summary: REQ-3 appears implemented in Header.tsx by adjusting the desktop logo text “ribbit” inline styles to fontSize 1.7rem and (per the accompanying file summary) letterSpacing -0.035rem while keeping Tilt Warp fontFamily and fontWeight 400. However, additional non-requested modifications were made to project metadata/summary files.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added descriptive metadata about many frontend files (including numerous UI/behavior details) in frontend-file-summaries.txt, which was not requested by the BuildRequest.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to adjust the desktop header logo typography in frontend/src/components/Header.tsx; it does not request regenerating or editing repository summary documentation.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project tracking/state metadata (project_state.json), including statuses and feature request listings unrelated to the specific typography change.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not ask for changes to project_state.json; it only specifies a code change in frontend/src/components/Header.tsx.
